text: Gucci Switzerland I'm very excited to
share that the new European AWS region
has opened in Switzerland right here in
beautiful Tunes
[Music]
Switzerland is one of the most
Innovative countries in the world and
swiss customers across the country have
embraced Cloud technology since the
earliest days of AWS
today there are more than 10 000 active
AWS customers across the country
including those in financial services
manufacturing education retail media and
many more
AWS has been investing in Switzerland
for many years we've created offices in
turkey and Geneva and have trained
technical experts to assist customers
with their Cloud Journeys
and with the addition of these new AWS
region we're now able to provide even
better service to our customers
companies in Switzerland can now run
their workloads closer to the customers
to reduce latency
and to meet data and residency
requirements with the option to store
data in country
this new AWS region consists of three
availability zones availability zones or
azs as I call them are made up of one or
more discrete data centers with
redundant power and networking Buffs
directly connecting every data center in
a region AWS customers focused on
reading highly available applications
can architect their systems to run in
multiple ACS to achieve even higher
fault tolerance than would be possible
from a single Data Center
in addition to the infrastructure
investment in Switzerland AWS is also
making investments in other areas
this includes education initiatives
Cloud skills training startup enablement
programs and the local hiring to support
the country's digital transformation and
economic development plans
I really look forward to learning about
the opportunities the new region will
bring to Switzerland
and I look forward to working with our
customers and an amazing set of Partners
to support them on their Cloud Journeys
now go build
